lender.name: Milan
lender.loan_because: I can help a bit

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I wanted to share my own good fortune and felt I should help others help themselves and have the opportunity to improve their living conditions for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: my daughter and myself would like to make a difference in peoples lives
lender.occupational_info: i sell websites to businesses to market their companies

lender.name: Gautam
lender.loan_because: Not everyone is as lucky as I am...

lender.name: Lil Momma & Big Pop
lender.loan_because: My husband and me have traveled the world in our many years of marriage. We have seen poverty at it's worst. John started his military career at the age of 16. He served in the Korean War twice. Even though he is retired now, he is still a military man with a peaceful and silent presents. Though I am retired I am a Registered Nurse and still keep up my license. Even in our Elderly years we still serve the less fortunate in our community. We are proud to see our Children, Grandchildren continue to serve the poor and needy. May God Bless You All.

lender.name: Briget
lender.loan_because: i want 2 help struggling people build their lives:)

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and other teachers how to use computers.

lender.name: Alexandro
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Timmetje
lender.loan_because: omdat het kan

lender.name: Fab
lender.loan_because: Hofstra University will not allow me to return for my second term of college until they get 13,300 from me or my family. We are poor, my mom is a single-parent of two...we just don't have that kind of money. However, I don't think it's right that my education should be halted just because we are poor,(I applied for financial aid through FAFSA, so Hofstra University knew in advance what our financial situation was). I desire to finish out this second term of college, and then transfer to a state university. I intend to pursue PreMed +Communications. Hofstra has deeply disappointed me as a student. They should not offer false-hope to kids. I don't want to lose any time in the pursuit of my education. They are suggesting that I sit-out until we have the money. We, as a family have done all that we could, asking others, and applying for various types of loans, which my mom was denied. I need help to get back in school.I believe that I will make a great doctor and will be able to help many, many, people, as a result of someone helping me. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: College student...2nd term. Aspiring Doctor.

lender.name: Danny & Katie
lender.loan_because:
Danny: I've always believed it is important to help each other out. I've been in situations where a small loan would make the difference in my life. And because I believe in the ol' saying, "give a man a fish, he eats for a day, teach a man to fish he eats for a lifetime."
Katie: I enjoy helping others!
lender.occupational_info:
Danny: I am currently a Psychology student, hoping to go on to become a Child Psychologist.
Katie: I am currently an Early Education (Pre-k thru 3rd grade) Teaching Student.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: there are so many people who need the money much more than i do
lender.occupational_info: learning a lot of useless things and a little essential stuff, sleeping, eating, running,.

lender.name: shirley
lender.loan_because: I care and want to give back. I live in a country where opportunities abound and have traveled extensively to poor nations.
lender.occupational_info: I am a humor writer for comedians

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I am investing in our shared future. Kiva works!
lender.occupational_info: I teach probation officers how to respond to crimes of domestic violence. Working to end men's violence against women.

lender.name: naadei
lender.occupational_info: Naadei is a 31yr old single mother working 3 jobs while raising her 2yr old daughter. In addition to supervising a staff of 10 employees, she also teaches Zumba dance fitness classes. Her goal is to raise enough funds to open a studio to start conducting her own zumba classes so she can have more quality time to raise her daughter. Naadei has been instructing zumba since 2006 and has anywhere from 55-78 students a night. Zumba also help Naadei shed 84lbs off of her frame. With proper diet and zumba she went from a sz 22 to sz 8. With hard work and perserverance Naadei is aiming to open Casa Wandita Dance Studio in 2010.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: everyone can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Property Contoller at the hotel Phillips. The hotel Phillips is a downtown Kansas City art deco landmark styled with hip atmosphere with a contemporary vintage luxury featuring lush accommodations and superb service, Hotel Phillips carries a rich tradition of excellence into the 21st century.

lender.name: Chalons
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who have the initiative to help themselves. Most of my loans are to women since I think they have the most potential to improve underdeveloped areas. I focus my lending on women who use their funds for sewing activities since I enjoy sewing.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I like the opportunity to make a difference I can personally see in a few people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver the U.S. Postal mail to the people in my local community. My husband and I also enjoy traveling, as he is retired.

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: Money comes around and I want it to be possible for all those who wish to succeed to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I study Civil Engineering at the University of Kansas

lender.name: CA Merchandise Exchange
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel good!
lender.occupational_info: As of January 2012, our business model is to take unwanted merchandise that people give us and resell it- then we are taking 10% of gross sales and making KIVA microloans.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: Taking care of and supporting others whenever possible is the compassionate, responsible thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach academic, social, and life skills to elementary students with a wide range of special needs. I'm an animal lover who has been vegan ten years and vegetarian since 2nd grade. I've got three cats (Carlotta, Fox, and Raymond), all black and white, but none related. I'm originally from Dallas, TX, but I lived in New York State for 10 years. I moved to GA after vowing never to live in the snowy north again. However, I may be headed back that way with my boyfriend who is planning to pursue a doctorate in anthropology - and apparently the only good anthro schools are in the frozen tundra!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: we are one people on earth

lender.name: Noelle
lender.loan_because: I feel bad for the people that don't have as much as I do and I want to help them. I love people.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I can see real people achieving tangible improvements in their lives

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: I can't do much, but I can do this.

lender.name: Vinny
lender.loan_because: to help people help themselves and because it feels good to help people!

lender.name: Mikalyn
lender.occupation: Quality Auditor and Belly Dance Instructor

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who were not as lucky to grow up in such fortunate circumstances
lender.occupational_info: I study law at university whilst working full time as a personal assistant to a solicitor

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: God has been so generous to me, I feel like I must give back.

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: I work from home on my computer, assisting small businesses with the design of their marketing materials and promotional projects.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Life is about leaving the world better than when you entered it. Many times in my life I have needed a hand and there was no one willing to give it. Loaning through Kiva makes people's dreams a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 20th Century History and US History at an International School

lender.loan_because: I have been helped many times and would like to give back to the community, even if its not in my country. Border lines do not stop the caring and giving between human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I became a registered massage therapist because of the high standard of education, but also because it was a way to help people feel better, if only for a while, but hopefully long term. It still makes me curious as to how the human body works and makes me want to learn more.

lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for technical innovation and business innovation in a multinational. I am also working on social innovation.

lender.occupational_info: My husband and I decided to operate a knit-work business. It started last year, October 10, 2009. We make sweaters, mafflers, cardigans, bonnets, gloves and other knit-work products. We distribute our merchandise to several stores and boutique owners in Baguio City, Philippines.

lender.name: Brian & Jodie Steck
lender.loan_because: Loaning is a brilliant idea. At a 98% repayment rate, the money is safer than in the bank (thanks to inflation) and there is no reason why it is okay for me, as part of a nation of wealth, to selfishly enjoy my wealth, while sisters and brothers in other nations struggle and die daily because of lack of basic needs.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a Catholic Elementary School. I do all the clerical work as well as accounting and payroll. I am the only one working in the office. lender.loan_because:
